entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -4.2°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
